description: Auto-delegation hooks for Owlex multi-agent workflows

examples.name: Large codebase review
examples.trigger: User asks to review/analyze a large codebase or many files
examples.suggestion: Consider using owlex:gemini-delegate for 1M+ token context

examples.name: Architecture decision
examples.trigger: User asks about architecture, trade-offs, or 'should we'
examples.suggestion: Consider using owlex:council-delegate for multiple perspectives

examples.name: Code review
examples.trigger: User asks for code review of specific files or PR
examples.suggestion: Consider using owlex:codex-delegate for focused analysis

examples.name: Implementation task
examples.trigger: User asks to implement, create, or build something
examples.suggestion: Consider using owlex:opencode-delegate for agentic coding

note: These are suggested patterns. Claude should use judgment based on context.
